Class AddFlight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands.AddFlight
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class AddFlight extends Object implements Command
Command to add a new flight to the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddFlight

      public AddFlight()
      Constructor for CLI mode (interactive input).

    • AddFlight

      public AddFlight(String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate)
      Constructor for GUI mode (basic parameters). Uses default capacity (100) and price (150.0).
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - the origin city
      destination - the destination city
      departureDate - the departure date

    • AddFlight

      public AddFlight(String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double price)
      Constructor for GUI mode (all parameters).
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - the origin city
      destination - the destination city
      departureDate - the departure date
      capacity - the flight capacity
      price - the base price

    • AddFlight

      public AddFlight(String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double price, boolean skipConfirmation)
      Constructor for GUI mode with confirmation bypass. Used when user has already confirmed duplicate flight in GUI.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - the origin city
      destination - the destination city
      departureDate - the departure date
      capacity - the flight capacity
      price - the base price
      skipConfirmation - if true, skip duplicate confirmation

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Executes the command.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Parameters:
      flightBookingSystem - the flight booking system
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if execution fails

    • confirmDuplicateFlight

      private boolean confirmDuplicateFlight(Flight existingFlight) throws IOException
      Asks user for confirmation to add duplicate flight (CLI mode).
      Parameters:
      existingFlight - the existing flight with same details
      Returns:
      true if user confirms, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if input reading fails

    • promptForInput

      private void promptForInput() throws IOException
      Prompts user for flight details (CLI mode). FIXED: Proper output flushing to ensure prompts appear correctly.

      IOException - if input reading fails
